A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The humor didn't always land\, and Canto Bight may be the most poorly executed plotline since the prequels\, but when The Last Jedi hits\, it hits hard. I adore this movie. Cut this movie 15 minutes shorter and it would be a 5 star film. As it sits now; 4 stars. Can't wait to see it again
